getInstance

public static ThreadManager getInstance()
Return the Singleton instance for the ThreadManager

Returns:
The instance of ThreadManager

startApplication

protected void startApplication(java.lang.String className,
                                java.lang.String IDuser)
Start a new application in a separated thread and notify the first user to the application. This method associate a password to the application and notify both SettingsManager and the application about it. This password will be used from Application to access to some critical method in security mode.

Parameters:
className - the Class Name that identify the Application.
IDuser - the ID Bluetooth that identify the user.

notifyNewUser

protected boolean notifyNewUser(java.lang.String application,
                                java.lang.String IDUser)
Notify a new user to the application.

Parameters:
application - the Application Name
IDUser - the ID Bluetooth that identify the user.
Returns:
true if new user incoming was being notifyed, false otherwise.

Parameters:

IDUser - the ID Bluetooth that identify the user.
message - a String that describe the reasons for the ban.
Returns:
true if the user banning was being notifyed, false otherwise.

Returns:

requestForClosing

public boolean requestForClosing(int password)
                          throws java.security.AccessControlException
An application can call this method to request to be closed to the Library.

Parameters:
password - the integer that identify the application who calls tis method.
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null, or not correct.

requestForUserDisconnection

public void requestForUserDisconnection(int password,
                                        java.lang.String IDUser)
                                 throws java.security.AccessControlException
An application can call this method to request for an user disconnection to the Library. The user must be registered for that application.

Parameters:
password - the integer that identify the application who calls tis method.
IDUser - the ID Bluetooth that identify the user that application wants disconnet.
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null, or not correct, or when the IDUser is not registered for the application that password represent.

notifyClosingToApp

protected boolean notifyClosingToApp(java.lang.String application)
Notify the exit command to the application.

Parameters:
application - The Application Name
Returns:
true if the exit command was being notifyed, false otherwise.

Returns:
the SwingWorker thread for the application.

onClosing

protected static boolean onClosing()
It is called when the Library has to be power off so it can nicely close the ThreadManager and all object, threads and application that it mange.

Returns:
true if all is closed and perfect destroyed, false otherwise.
